4303270.name: The Kingdoms of Ædloran
4303270.description:
The Kelestaren Empire is no more. Over a century has passed since its collapse, and as it fades from living memory, new powers begin to emerge from its ashes. Your journey starts in Valynd, a region of central-western Ædloran composed of many fragmented kingdoms vying for stability and control in this uncertain, post-imperial era. Set out on your adventure and discover this vibrant magical world filled with fantastic stories of bravery, fellowship, villainy and conquest. From the endless deserts across the Sea of Kelar, to the lush primeval forests of central Ædloran, and up to the frozen peaks of the Lyrestian Mountains—Ædloran is an ancient land with many mysteries.



Features:

EXPLORE - Traverse a vast open world teeming with life and filled with towns, wilderness, ruins, and hidden dangers.

QUEST - Accept quests along your journey from ordinary townsfolk, faction members, and wanderers to earn gold, experience, and valuable items.

LEVEL UP - Choose a class and level up to unlock new abilities, trained through your class trainer.

COMBAT - Test your skills and fight against all manner of adversaries, be it bandits, wild beasts, monstrous foes or legendary villains.

DUNGEONS - Delve into dungeons rife with perils and brave what dangers lurk around every corner of these dark forgotten places of the world.

LOOT - Loot fallen enemies, open bountiful chests, and harvest natural resources found throughout the world.
4303270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
